text: Bapusaheb Parulekar (born 2 July 1929 in Bandra, Bombay, India) was an Indian member of the 6th Lok Sabha and 7th Lok Sabha of India. His real name was Chandrakant Parulekar, but he was better known by the honorific 'Bapusaheb'. He represented the Ratnagiri constituency of Maharashtra, winning the election in 1977 and 1980, and was a member of the Jan Sangh until 1977, when it merged with Janata Party. ==References== Category:6th Lok Sabha members Category:7th Lok Sabha members Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Marathi politicians Category:Bharatiya Jana Sangh politicians Category:Janata Party politicians Category:Lok Sabha members from Maharashtra Category:People from Ratnagiri district Category:Ratnagiri district councillors Category:Bharatiya Lok Dal politicians
title: Bapusaheb Parulekar
